_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four best kinds of confidence [an4.3: Confidence in the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha
Confidence in the noble eightfold path
Confidence in the teaching of fading away
Confidence in the Saṅgha of the Realized One’s disciples
